summary: Nothing big, just a couple perk changes for the Enchanting skill-tree
descriptionHtml:
Enchanting Spellsword

I usually play with the vanilla skill-trees and I really dislike the Enchanting skill-tree. My attempt was to make some parts of it more useful.

It [u]replaces[/u] the following perks(you can also check the images):

[s] Soul Squeezer[/s] > Combat Casting
All spells cost 20% less magicka while wielding a one-handed weapon.

[s] Soul Siphon[/s] > Spellsword
Restoration and Destruction spells are 15% stronger while wielding a one-handed weapon.

[s] Extra Effect[/s] > Soul Consumption
Killing blows to all creatures trap 20% of the victim's soul, recharging the weapon.

This mod requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url], therefore will only work on Skyrim - Legendary Edition.
author: Bubblefist
